text: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَاۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّن ذِكۡرِيۚ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِ

translation.en: Has the message been revealed to him out of [all of] us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment
translation.id: mengapa Alquran itu diturunkan kepada Dia di antara kita?" Sebenarnya mereka ragu-ragu terhadap Alquran-Ku, tetapi mereka belum merasakan azab(-Ku)
